content: make one or create a colorful set of crochet storage baskets shaped like seashells designed in bernat maker splash these ocean-inspired crochet conch shell baskets are stitched in row with building-up spirals to create the elegant shell shape challenge yourself with single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet in back loops increases slip_stitch and more fill them with dried flowers knick-knacks and more it s a great way to add organizational beauty and a touch of coastal charm to your home materials bernat® maker splash™ 8 8 oz /250 g 305 yds/279 m concrete 35001 or blue print 35011 or teal print 35010 1 ball or 210 yds/195 m measurement approx 15 38 cm excluding loop
